meta.description: Maximize the total profit from making fruit salads A and B given the available stock of fruits and constraints on leftover or additional usage.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits used in salads

params.name: profit
params.description: Net profit for each unit of fruit salad

params.name: requirement
params.description: Amount of each fruit required to make one unit of each salad

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each fruit salad to produce

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[s] * x[s] for s in SALADS)
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from producing fruit salads A and B

constraints.name: mango_usage
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(requirement[s]['mango'] * x[s] for s in SALADS)
constraints.description: Mango usage must not exceed available stock plus 5 additional units

constraints.name: pineapple_usage
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(requirement[s]['pineapple'] * x[s] for s in SALADS)
constraints.description: Pineapple usage must not exceed available stock plus 5 additional units

constraints.name: strawberry_usage
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(requirement[s]['strawberry'] * x[s] for s in SALADS)
constraints.description: Strawberry usage must not exceed available stock plus 5 additional units
